name: @night-cloud/miner
description: Standalone mining orchestrator for Night Cloud Miner

scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: npm run build:ts:compile && npm run build:ts:bundle
scripts.build:ts:bundle: esbuild dist/cli.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/cli.bundled.js && esbuild dist/scripts/assign-addresses.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/scripts/assign-addresses.bundled.js && esbuild dist/scripts/cleanup-registry.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/scripts/cleanup-registry.bundled.js && mv dist/cli.bundled.js dist/cli.js && mv dist/scripts/assign-addresses.bundled.js dist/scripts/assign-addresses.js && mv dist/scripts/cleanup-registry.bundled.js dist/scripts/cleanup-registry.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/scripts/*.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && cd rust && cargo clean
